metadata.title: EYELASH EVOLUTION Reusable Self Adhesive Eyelashes Paired Lashes No Glue Required No Liquid Eyeliner Easy To Put On Soft and Comfortable Without Irritation (LC-303 Dandelion)
description: FEATURES Self-Adhesive No Glue Required NO liquid eyeliner No irritating&No allergic Apply within 3 seconds How To Use: 1. Please clean your eyes before use. Do not leave grease or liquid, which will affect the viscosity and shorten the use time. 2. Carefully remove eyelashes from the box withcrescent card tool. 3. Eyelashes should be compared according to the length of eyeliner. If necessary, trim to the right length and width. 4. Eyelashes do not need glue. Just stick the self-adhesive eyelashes on your eyes and put them on in a few seconds. 5. After using eyelashes, please paste them back into the box. Dust will affect the use of tape. 6. After removing the eyelashes, place them on the eyelash holder and buckle the dust cap. Skills Of Using Crescent Card Tool: 1. Use a crescent card to gently fix the roots of the eyelashes along the eyelash holder. 2. Pick up one end of the rubber strip with a crescent card and take off the eyelashes. 3.Stick to the upper part of the real eyelashes according to the middle first and then the two sides. Tips: 1. Before wearing false eyelashes, clean the grease on the eyelashes and eyelids with remover. 2. Self-adhesive Eyelashes should ONLY be worn BEFORE applying the skin-care and make-up process. 3. Cold weather will affect the stickiness of the tape. Please use a hair dryer to heat the adhesive strips to ensure the adhesiveness of the adhesive strips.
